title: Are there any nice Udyrs in this game?
body:
If they are winning, its just BMing the other team, but if they are losing, god help the people on their team. Its insane. I know riven players get a bad reputation, but Udyr mains are really unbearable.

{{item:3073}} {{item:3073}}

replies.body: I don't see many bad sport udyr players In high Silver right now, but then again I don't see many at all anymore ever since that one udyr nerf that knocked him off of god tier a few patches ago. Think it had to do with his phoenix stance and health regen or something.
most udyrs are like that only because the reason they play udyr is trick2g, they learn from him and he's very toxic, but he's popular and good, so those players become toxic... but not good
Hahahaha unbearable I see what you did there
udyrs way are better than vaynes, yasuos, zeds, rivens and luxs
